QuestData.Title: Argent Call: The Trial of the Crypt
QuestData.Description: Behind our chapel, you will find a small crypt. Interred within are the bodies of our fallen heroes; those who gave their lives in the war against the Scourge.$b$bTheir spirits are at peace, but they return intermittently to test new members of the order.$b$bThe three of you may test together. Enter the crypt, then read from this scroll. Lord Raymond George - my predecessor - will preside over your test.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Crypt behind Light's Hope Chapel, read from the Argent Scroll, then complete his test.
QuestData.CompletionText: Your test is not yet complete.
QuestData.RewardText: Remember that your ancestors always watch over you. As a $g brother: sister; of the Argent Crusade, you will join a family that has a long line of such fallen ancestors. Their vigil and protection will be your strength as you press forward against the Scourge.$b$bCongratulations Tarenar, Gidwin, and $n. Welcome to the Argent Crusade.
